title: Darkened Magic
description: Recovering from an addiction to dark magic and hiding from the guilt of the terrible crimes she committed, Vivian doesn’t expect her encounter with a handsome stranger to lead to a job use her powers to find the magician he’s been hired to kill.The only problem? His target is her ex, and as the past claws its way from the darkness, she must face the monster she was, too.Do villains get second chances? Find out in this wicked paranormal romance.
author: Haven Price
